column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My first stop in Chicago after checking into the hotel was to the Art Institute
column2: which was only a stone's throw away from the hotel. It's awesome
column6: and so much to see. We definitely covered the galleries I wanted to see although on a Sunday
column7: it was pretty crowded. My only gripe (and maybe because I was tired from flying in from Pittsburgh early that morning then waiting 4 hours for my brother to land) is that since there are SO many galleries
column8: it's hard to navigate. But I just let my brother take the lead in reading the museum map.
